CustomField.inlineHelpText:
HOT– Ready to buy the right property now and can sign a contract within the next 4 weeks. Knows what they want and most likely has the funds or has a pre-approval in place.
WARM – Looking to within the next 6 months and is doing research to firm up what and where.
COLD – More than 6 months away, or not sure when, what or where.
